name: Brilliant-SmartHomeControl
0:
”Alexa, turn on the kitchen lights.”
”Alexa, turn off the kitchen lights.”
”Alexa, dim the kitchen lights.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Control the lights throughout your home using just your voice. Ask Alexa to turn the lights on/off or adjust the dimming. You must have at least one Brilliant Smart Home Control installed in your house.
